sentence.Network_en: Off-screen, Kathy is under the watchful eye of her father Terry.
sentence.Network_cn: 生活中的凯茜受到父亲特里的严格看管。

sentence.Network_en: To this end the young child is forever watchful.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个年纪不大的孩子为此始终保持警惕。

sentence.Network_en: He first learnt to fish under the watchful eye of his grandmother.
sentence.Network_cn: 在祖母的看护下，他第一次学起了钓鱼。

entry.def: Someone who is watchful notices everything that is happening.

example.ex: The best thing is to be watchful and see the family doctor for any change in your normal health...
example.tran: 最佳的做法是保持警惕，一旦你的身体状况有任何变化就立即去看家庭医生。

example.ex: He looked tall and powerful and, with his dark, watchful face, a little threatening.
example.tran: 他看上去又高又壮，面色黝黑，满脸警觉，真叫人有点害怕。

entry.tran: 在(某人)的警觉目光下；在…的监视下
entry.def: If you do something under the watchful eye of someone who has authority over you, they watch you carefully to make sure there are no problems.

example.ex: There were demonstrations in the streets today, under the watchful eye of police...
example.tran: 今天，在警方的监视下大街上进行了游行。

example.ex: Children swim at the pool, under the watchful eye of lifeguards.
example.tran: 孩子们在救生员的监护下在水池里游泳。

entry.def: If you keep a watchful eye on someone or something, you watch carefully to make sure there are no problems.

example.ex: Keep a watchful eye on babies and toddlers.
example.tran: 要看好婴儿和刚会走路的孩子。

means.word_mean: 1. carefully observant or attentive; on the lookout for possible danger;

sentences.sentence: "the vigilant eye of the town watch"
"there was a watchful dignity in the room"
"a watchful parent with a toddler in tow"

auth_sentence.content: A watchful readiness evident to the most unskilled eye.
auth_sentence.res_content: A watchful readiness evident to the most unskilled eye.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A watchful readiness evident to the most unskilled eye.

auth_sentence.content: Finally, be watchful for claims of all-too-consistent returns.
auth_sentence.res_content: Finally, be watchful for claims of all-too-consistent returns.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Finally, be watchful for claims of all-too-consistent returns.

auth_sentence.content: Under the very watchful eyes of the international community.
auth_sentence.res_content: Under the very watchful eyes of the international community.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Under the very watchful eyes of the international community.

sentences.en: The children played under the watchful eye of their father.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在父亲的小心照看下玩耍。
